title: freshers intro page??
content: there isn’t a freshers’ intro page for ‘27 batch on instagram yet. i think it would be a nice idea to get to know each other

comments.body:
Actually there is one, called pesufreshets 27 if I'm not wrong. 
We have whatsapp groups in place too
How does one enter into this :p
I'll dm you the link to joining it! Just send me a hi
